CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 笑；微笑；露出笑容；微笑着说；微笑地表示

word_mean_info__list.difference: 最常用词，指因喜悦、愉快或轻视而出声的笑或大笑。
指发出咯咯的笑声，较多地用于女人或孩子。
书面用词，指人因心情舒畅而发出的笑，即喜形于色地笑。
指面露微笑，侧重于无声。

word_group.brief_definition: (尤指愁眉苦脸或悲伤之后)一脸笑意, 喜滋滋的
露出笑容；莞尔一笑；强颜欢笑

bilingual.source: Grandpa gives me a big smile, and I smile back.
bilingual.target: 爷爷对我露出灿烂的笑容，我也回以微笑。
那个微笑改变了我的生活。

bilingual.source: A little money can make him smile.
There was a smile on Alfie's face.
bilingual.target: 阿尔菲脸上露出了微笑。

bilingual.source: In China, people shake hands and smile.
bilingual.target: 在中国，人们握手并微笑。

bilingual.source: As the smile grew, the Sun came back.
bilingual.target: 随着微笑变大，太阳回来了。
微笑并说“你好！”来交朋友。

bilingual.source: I arrive at work with a smile on my face.
bilingual.target: 我到达工作地点时脸上带着微笑。

list.abstract: smile（英 [smaɪl]，美 [smaɪl]），英语单词，作动词为微笑；露出笑容；赞许。作名词为微笑。短语搭配有warm smile（温暖笑容）。例句为“But suddenly, the smile froze on his lips.（但突然，他嘴唇上的微笑僵住了。）” smile相关近义词有beam on。
《微笑》是由日本TBS电视台制作并播出的11集剧情电视剧，由石井康晴、坪井敏雄导演，宅间孝行编剧，松本润、新垣结衣、中井贵一、小栗旬、小池荣子等主演，于2009年4月17日首播。 该剧以人类之间的爱，厚重的爱为主题。

yingyinNormal.en: Squeeze in. That's it. Historic occasion. Everyone, smile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 挤一挤。这是历史性的时刻。大家一起，微笑。

yingyinNormal.en: And then you arrived. Just smile and wave, boys. Smile and wave. And took everything from me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后你们来了。同志们，微笑，招手。微笑，招手。你们抢走了我应有的一切 。

yingyinNormal.en: In high school, you'll start going to Friday night parties. Someone will smile at you, you'll smile back, you are in love.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在高中，你们会开始参加周五夜派对，有人对你微笑，你回以微笑，你们坠入爱河。

yingyinNormal.en: What is that? No. That's like a smile. You don't smile. Cut it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是个屁啦？不是，那看起来像微笑，你从来不笑，少装了。

yingyinNormal.en: And not a day shall pass that I don't miss your smile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 将来到来的每一天，我都会思念你的微笑。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it's at table 2, 5, 7, and 12. Service with a smile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，是在2、5、7、12号桌，跑堂时要微笑。

yingyinNormal.en: He's the only one who can put a smile on Megan's face. Even for a second.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是唯一能让梅根微笑的人，哪怕只有一秒也好。

yingyinNormal.en: And when she opens the door, give her a dashing debonair smile. Come, come, show me the smile. Oh, my God! Oh, no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当她打开门，给她一个灿烂的微笑。来吧，来吧，给我笑一个。哦 上帝啊！哦，不。

yingyinNormal.en: And if I hadn't got anything more to what that smile he gave me, I wouldn't have been well repaid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如我没有任何东西多于他给我的微笑，我不会得到很好的回报。

yingyinNormal.en: They stayed in their fortress and gave everybody a friendly smile, and eventually, they walked upstairs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们待在城堡里跟所有人友善地微笑，最终，他们去了楼上。

yingyinNormal.en: What do I need to do? When you and Peeta are on tour, you need to smile. You need to be grateful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你需要我做什么？你和皮塔的这次旅程要多点儿微笑，要表现出感恩。

yingyinNormal.en: Cam's grandma died? Oh, my God. You still do that thing where you smile whenever you talk about death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小卡的奶奶死了？我的天啊，你还是这样，只要一说到死亡，你就会开始微笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, you can hide behind a sexy smile or a walking cane, or just be a therapist, talking about you all the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个性感的微笑或拐杖就能让你隐藏起来，或是做个治疗师，一直聊你的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Today isn't just about building a duck village. It's about building your smile. Don't fight it. There it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天我们不只是建造一个鸭子村而已，更是要让你学会微笑，别抗拒，终于笑了。

yingyinNormal.en: His smile of disappointment has turned into a frown of joy. It's fine, I've been driving him for years. What's one more day?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他失望的微笑变成了愉悦的皱眉。还好啦，我都载他多少年了。多载一天又如何？

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, alright, alright. It's been fourteen and a half minutes and you still have not said one word. Oh, god. Do something! Just make contact. Smile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 已过了14分30秒，你却连一字也没说，争气点，打破沉闷，微笑。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm looking at people who are waiting, with a smile on their face, for their turn. And the most vicious among them are the ones who are smiling and clapping the hardest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看到的都是一群脸上挂着微笑，等待着自己机会来临的人。那些笑得最开怀鼓掌最热烈的人也是其中最阴险的。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure, sometimes people smile a big smile of disappointment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说有就有吧，有时人们会在失望的时候露出超大的笑容。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, here we go, and smile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，我们开始拍吧，笑一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine. What do you want me to do? Smile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，那你让我怎么做？笑。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 微笑的；欢快的；喜气洋洋的

word_family.mean: v. 微笑；露出笑容；赞许；用微笑表达；露出；惠及；明媚的；宜人的

examination_example.sentence: How did <highlight>smiling</highlight> in photographs become a post-Victorian norm?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 照片中的微笑是如何成为后维多利亚时代的常态的？

examination_example.sentence: The tester would ask, "What's in here?" before looking into the container, <highlight>smiling</highlight>, and exclaiming, "Wow!"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 测试者会先问：“这里面有什么？”然后再看看容器，微笑着惊呼：“哇！”

examination_example.sentence: Only strong people prefer to <highlight>smile</highlight> and value their life instead of crying and complaining about something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有坚强的人更喜欢微笑，更珍惜自己的生命，而不是哭着抱怨什么。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 态度友好; 以微笑表示

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 态度友好; 以微笑表示

word_usage.usage:
smile表“微笑, 笑容”，为可数名词，常用单数形式。
示例：他笑容满面。 
误 He had big smile on his face. 
正 He had a big smile on his face.

“冲...笑”，用smile at表达。
示例：She smiled at him and he smiled back.
她冲他笑笑，他也冲她笑笑。

smile用作及物动词时，还可表“微笑着表达”，接名词作宾语；也可引出直接宾语，意为“微笑着说”。
示例："Perfect," he smiled. 
“好极了。”他微笑着说。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: Now, at the age of 46, I look back on those dreams and <highlight>smile</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，46岁的我回首那些梦想，会心一笑。

examination_example.sentence: They arrive at the class in a bad mood, and they leave with a <highlight>smile</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们带着坏心情来上课，然后带着微笑离开。

word_usage.usage:
“冲...笑”，用smile at表达。
示例：She smiled at him and he smiled back.
她冲他笑笑，他也冲她笑笑。

smile表“微笑, 笑容”，为可数名词，常用单数形式。
示例：他笑容满面。 
误 He had big smile on his face. 
正 He had a big smile on his face.

smile用作及物动词时，还可表“微笑着表达”，接名词作宾语；也可引出直接宾语，意为“微笑着说”。
示例："Perfect," he smiled. 
“好极了。”他微笑着说。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 微笑的；欢快的；喜气洋洋的

word_family.mean: v. 微笑；露出笑容；赞许；用微笑表达；露出；惠及；明媚的；宜人的

examination_example.sentence: As sad as it was, I couldn't help <highlight>smiling</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管很难过，我还是忍不住笑了。

examination_example.sentence: Rani's friendliness —her warm <highlight>smile</highlight>, her nods, her 'I'm here for you' attitude—were all silent signals that didn't travel through wires.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拉尼的友善——她温暖的微笑，她的点头，她的“我在这里等你”的态度——都是无声的信号，不可能通过电线传递。

examination_example.sentence: She gave me a comforting <highlight>smile</highlight>, nodded while listening patiently, and then printed out the ticket immediately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她给了我一个安慰的微笑，点了点头，耐心地听着，然后立即打印出了票。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 微笑着说; 微笑着表示

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 严肃的；不友好的；面无笑容的
adj. 微笑的；欢快的；喜气洋洋的

word_family.mean: v. 微笑；露出笑容；赞许；用微笑表达；露出；惠及；明媚的；宜人的

examination_example.sentence: Every time I go to see a doctor and see a <highlight>smile</highlight> on the doctor's face, I feel really warm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次去看医生，看到医生脸上的笑容，我感觉真的很温暖。

examination_example.sentence: The teacher looked at me and <highlight>smiled</highlight> without a word.
The lady was <highlight>smiling</highlight> and holding a few coins in her hand．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位女士微笑着，手里拿着几枚硬币。

sense_info_list.en: to say or express something with a smile
sense_info_list.zh: 微笑着说; 微笑着表示

examination_example.sentence: "I think you can live to be 100 years old. " <highlight>smiled</highlight> his mother.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他妈妈微笑着说：“我觉得你可以活到100岁。”

examination_example.sentence: When someone asked him what color his training life was, Yixing <highlight>smiled</highlight>, "It's colorless. I don't know what color effort is."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当有人问他训练生活是什么颜色时，张艺兴笑着回答:“无色。我不知道努力是什么颜色。”
面包师笑着说：“你的线更短了。”

word_usage.usage:
smile表“微笑, 笑容”，为可数名词，常用单数形式。
示例：他笑容满面。 
误 He had big smile on his face. 
正 He had a big smile on his face.

“冲...笑”，用smile at表达。
示例：She smiled at him and he smiled back.
她冲他笑笑，他也冲她笑笑。

smile用作及物动词时，还可表“微笑着表达”，接名词作宾语；也可引出直接宾语，意为“微笑着说”。
示例："Perfect," he smiled. 
“好极了。”他微笑着说。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指出声地笑，既有声音，又有表情。
指（无声地）微笑，指面部表情。
